page.title: 12CHARLBURY SCHOOL CHILD'S DAY
page.content: At 8.15 I get up and dress ready for school. On Wednesdays I have to take my violin. We have the register first then we all go into assembly where we sing hymns and are talked to. When we get back our teacher talks to us. We plan what we are going to do then I have my violin lesson, after which it's playtime. I play "cavalry charge" or football. The bell rings at 11.00. We all come in and continue with our work. Lunch is at 12.00.You can have a school dinner or packed lunch. Dinner play lasts for an hour. We come in, have the register and either carry on with the morning's activities or start something new.We have another play which lasts for 15 minutes then we tidy up.We have a story then go home.I walk to Dad's office and then to a house called "Appletrees" for my recorder lesson.I go to Guides from 6.15 until 7.45.
